org.unict.ing.pds.dhtdb.datamanager

Class DataManagerChordSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unict.ing.pds.dhtdb.datamanager.DataManagerChordSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataManagerChordSessionBeanLocal

    public class DataManagerChordSessionBean
extends Object
implements DataManagerChordSessionBeanLocal
    The bean responsible of the low-level communication with the Chord Overlay network
